article_summary:
— Daniel Martin (@marti431uew) May 23, 2015@AP_Politics @AP the only answer is universal expanded medicare4all — Krista (@Krista10612342) May 23, 2015That’ll do the trick.

“I think it’s going to be the next big problem,” said Rep. Jim McDermott, D-Wash., a congressional leader on health care.
